title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Experiential Projects for Enhancing Social Media Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify misinformation and phishing cases on social media platforms with 80% accuracy
Learners perform crisis management scenarios (e.g., cyberbullying response, personal information protection) with over 90% engagement in experiential simulation environments
Learners analyze real-world cases to create social media ethics guidelines applicable to their professional fields and obtain feedback scoring over 4 points (out of 5) through peer evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
